Engineers in this discipline work with data: check its behavior in a new system, control quantity and quality. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More detailed information:  \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Quality Engineering is part of the Data & Analytics practice. It’s very close to automated testing by nature of work. Data quality engineers work with modern scalable cloud analytical services based on Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud, MS Azure. They use Big Data technologies: Hadoop, MapReduce, Spark, Kafka, etc.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What tasks
